root.name: Flips: Enid Blyton - Faraway Tree Stories
root.description: OverviewFaraway: Tree stories includes six books: The Enchanted Wood, The Folk of the Faraway Tree, The Magic Faraway Tree, Melody and the Enchanted Harp, Petal and the Eternal Bloom, and Silky and the Rainbow Feather. Players can also collect hidden items found across the pages of the six ebooks.
